00001 #ifndef SOLDIER_MACROS_H
00002 #define SOLDIER_MACROS_H
00003 
00004 // MACROS FOR EASIER SOLDIER CONTROL
00005 #include "teamturns.h"
00006 #include "soldier profile.h"
00007 #include "assignments.h"
00008 
00009 // MACROS
00010 #define RPC_RECRUITED( p )    ( ( p->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE ) ? FALSE : ( gMercProfiles[ p->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_RECRUITED ) )
00011 
00012 #define AM_AN_EPC( p )  ( ( p->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE ) ? FALSE : ( gMercProfiles[ p->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_EPCACTIVE ) )
00013 
00014 #define AM_A_ROBOT( p ) ( ( p->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE ) ? FALSE : ( gMercProfiles[ p->ubProfile ].ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON ) )
00015 
00016 
00017 #define OK_ENEMY_MERC( p ) ( !p->bNeutral && (p->bSide != gbPlayerNum ) && p->bLife >= OKLIFE )
00018 
00019 // Checks if our guy can be controllable .... checks bInSector, team, on duty, etc...
00020 #define OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( p ) ( p->bLife >= OKLIFE && p->bActive && p->bInSector && p->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && p->bAssignment < ON_DUTY  )
00021 
00022 // Checks if our guy can be controllable .... checks bInSector, team, on duty, etc...
00023 #define OK_INSECTOR_MERC( p ) ( p->bLife >= OKLIFE && p->bActive && p->bInSector && p->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && p->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
00024             
00025 // Checkf if our guy can be selected and is not in a position where our team has an interupt and he does not have one...
00026 #define OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( p ) ( ( INTERRUPT_QUEUED != 0 ) ? ( ( p->bMoved ) ? FALSE : TRUE ) : TRUE )
00027 
00028 #define CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( p ) ( (p->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER) || p->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
00029 
00030 #define TANK( p ) (p->ubBodyType == TANK_NE || p->ubBodyType == TANK_NW )
00031 
00032 #define OK_ENTERABLE_VEHICLE( p )   ( ( p->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !TANK( p ) && p->bLife >= OKLIFE  )
00033 
00034 #endif
